aom.scripting.ui.console

Class Camera

  • Object
    • Camera

  • public class Camera
extends Object
    This class provides a collection of Console commands concerning the Camera.
    Local Call
    Camera commands are all local.
    Author
    Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com
